attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in all members of parliament as a result of brexit fiasco
attributes.additional_details: None of our MPs are willing to work together for the good of our country leading us into a car crash with brexit
attributes.background:
Our members of parliament are not representing the people of Great Britain 
Putting party politics before the needs of our country 
Not resolving differences by following party politics rather than working together for a better Britain

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead: 

Hold a Public Vote of No Confidence in the Administration of the United Kingdom 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237424

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449
